abstract: Explore meiosis and fertilization in dragons in a special lab that gives students the power to recombine alleles.
description: Enter the virtual world of Geniverse where students explore heredity and genetics by breeding and studying virtual dragons. In this activity, control the process of meiosis and fertilization in dragons. Win challenges by examining the genes on dragon chromosomes, recombining alleles and selecting the right gametes. PLEASE NOTE: This activity can be assigned, but student responses will not be saved.
name: What is Meiosis?
